snippet: The show copies the spinning chairs of the NBC rival to Fox's "American Idol," as celebrities decide, in what amounts to a blind audition, which sexy single to go on a date with.
abstract: The show copies the spinning chairs of the NBC rival to Fox's "American Idol," as celebrities decide, in what amounts to a blind audition, which sexy single to go on a date with.

headline.main: Fox Mocks 'The Voice' With a New Dating Show, 'The Choice'
